response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "link": {
        "shortCode": "polymatic30",
        "warnings": [
            "unsupported_protocol"
        ],
        "description": "Polymaticast 30",
        "type": "collection",
        "link": "\/\/testo.local\/app_dev.php\/polymatic30",
        "links": [
            {
                "shortCode": "1",
                "warnings": [],
                "description": "",
                "collection": "polymatic30",
                "type": "link",
                "link": "\/\/testo.local\/app_dev.php\/1",
                "url": "http:\/\/qwerqwerqewrqwerwr"
            },
            {
                "shortCode": "2",
                "warnings": [],
                "description": "",
                "collection": "polymatic30",
                "type": "link",
                "link": "\/\/testo.local\/app_dev.php\/2",
                "url": "http:\/\/wrqwerqwer"
            },
            {
                "shortCode": "3",
                "warnings": [
                    "nsfw"
                ],
                "description": "bleep",
                "collection": "polymatic30",
                "type": "link",
                "link": "\/\/testo.local\/app_dev.php\/3",
                "url": "http:\/\/wrqwerqwer"
            },
            {
                "shortCode": "otaku",
                "warnings": [],
                "description": "Brings all the otaku to the yard?",
                "collection": "polymatic30",
                "type": "link",
                "link": "\/\/testo.local\/app_dev.php\/otaku",
                "url": "http:\/\/www.ognetworks.tv"
            }
        ]
    }
}
